EmailTemplate.description: Email to Finance Team when an expense is approved by Manager
EmailTemplate.name: Expense is Approved - Email to Finance Team
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Peritus : Expense Approved for {!Expense__c.Employee_ID__c} - {!Expense__c.Resource__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Finance Team,
Expense request by {!Expense__c.Employee_ID__c} - {!Expense__c.Resource__c} for {!Expense__c.Expense_Type__c} has been approved by {!Expense__c.Approval_Manager__c}.
Expense amount approved: {!Expense__c.Expense_Amount1__c} {!NullValue(Expense__c.Billing_Currency__c")}
Please review it here and do the needful.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
